name: Iaido Slash Spec
desc:
Further enhances the ability to use Iaido Slash.
When the number of Thunder Sigils consumed by Iaido Slash and its enhanced skill (Thunder Cut) equals the current maximum Thunder Sigil count, increases the DMG of Iaido Slash and its enhanced skill (Thunder Cut) by 12% and grants Super Armor during the cast.

name: Iaido Mastery
desc:
Iaido Slash's Crit +10%.
When Iaido Slash's critical rate exceeds 60%, each additional 1% grants 1% bonus Crit DMG.

name: Thunder Sigil Affinity
desc: Each additional Thunder Sigil consumed by Expertise or Special Attacks increases your Lightning DMG dealt by 1.5% when they deal DMG.

name: Flash Frenzy Blade
desc: Crit hit of Iaido Slash grants a fixed 10% chance to clear the CD of Flash Strike and Raijin Dash. Chance +10% for each Thunder Sigil consumed.

name: Zen Moment
desc: Crit Hits of Special Attacks grant 100 Blade Intent.

name: Thunder God's Might
desc: Activate Volt Surge. Flash Strike and Raijin Dash evolve into Dracoflash and Phantom Slash.

name: Thunder Curse
desc:
Special Attacks inflict Thunder Curse on the target upon dealing DMG.
Thunder Curse: Each stack of Thunder Curse increases the target's DMG taken from you by 2% for 10s, stacking up to 4 times.

name: Instant Slash
desc: Iaido Slash reduces the Armor of the target hit by 6%. The effect lasts 5s and stacks up to 5 times.

name: Rapid Thunder Assault
desc: Each additional Thunder Sigil consumed by a skill increases its DMG by 3%.

name: Frenzied Thunder Roar
desc: Defeating an enemy triggers Thunderburst, once every 3s.

name: Wind Assault II
desc: Unleashes formidable energy to weaken nearby enemies, reducing their movement speed. Common monsters below 15% HP will instantly disperse.

name: Violent Slash
desc: Increases the critical rate of Iaido Slash and Thunder Cut by 12%.

name: End of Annihilation
desc: The final strike of Oblivion Combo is empowered into Ultimate Slash.

name: Blade Intent Thunder Strike
desc: When Iaido Slash deals Crit DMG, if the Blade Intent exceeds 20, launches Thunderstrike (which can only be triggered once per use of Iaido Slash).

name: Wind Assault I
desc: Crit Rate obtained in any way is increased by 12%, but Luck chance obtained in any way are reduced by 10%.

name: Flash Sharp Strike
desc:
Triggers Sharp Strike when casting Iaido Slash.
Sharp Strike: Increases Crit Rate of Flash Strike and its enhanced skill (Dracoflash) by 10%. If Flash Strike and its enhanced skill (Dracoflash) deals Crit DMG 1 time, gains 1 Thunder Sigil. This effect is removed after the use of Flash Strike and its enhanced skill (Dracoflash) or after 10s.

name: Thunder Sigil Rewind
desc: When consuming Thunder Sigils, there is a chance to return 1 Thunder Sigil, and for each additional 1 Thunder Sigil consumed, the return chance +8%.

name: Unmatched Raijin Dash
desc:
Raijin Dash and its enhanced skill (Phantom Slash) ignore the target's Armor.
Raijin Dash and its enhanced skill (Phantom Slash) deal 10% more damage per additional 1 enemy hit.

name: Infinite Thunder
desc: For every 5 Thunder Sigils consumed, the remaining CD time of Volt Surge -0.5s.

name: Vacuum Slash
desc: Each cast of Flash Strike, Raijin Dash, or its evolved skills grants 1 layer of Thundrage. When Thundrage reaches 5 stacks, Iaido Slash evolves into Thunder Cut. After casting Thunder Cut, 5 stacks of Thundrage are consumed. Thundrage stacks up to 8 times.

name: Thunder Reversal
desc:
Consumes 100 Blade Intent to gain stacks of Thunder Reversal Mark. When Thunder Reversal Mark reaches 5 stacks, casting Iaido Slash grants the Thunder Reversal effect and removes all Thunder Reversal Mark stacks.
Thunder Reversal: Gain a 10% Lightning DMG bonus for 15s. During Thunder Reversal, Thunder Reversal Mark cannot be gained.

name: Duel Awareness
desc: Deals 20% more DMG to enemies with 80% HP or above.

name: Break Slash
desc: When dealing Crit DMG, Iaido Slash and its enhanced skill (Thunder Cut) nullifies 30% of the targets' Armor.

name: Shadow Despise
desc: For each enemy within 3m, you gain 3% Armor Penetration, up to 15%. This effect is doubled against Elite or stronger enemies.

name: Dual Blade Intent
desc:
When Blade Intent is at least 100, Flash Strike, Raijin Dash, and their enhanced skills (Dracoflash, Phantom Slash) gain Crit Rate by 10%.
When Blade Intent is at least 100, greatly increases Flash Strike's casting speed.

name: Bladewind Domain
desc: Every 3 casts of Overdrive allows the next Iaido Slash to generate a Bladewind Domain in front. Each time Bladewind Domain deals DMG, reduces the CD of Oblivion Combo by 1.5s.

name: Thundrage
desc: Each use of Dracoflash or Phantom Slash grants 4 stacks of Thundrage, up to 8 stacks.
